alert.note: Alert for Inland Kleberg (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 14 at 10:48AM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Kleberg County through 1130 AM CDT... At 1046 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles west of Riviera, or 11 miles east of Premont, moving east at 20 mph. A funnel cloud could be possible as radar indicated rotation. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Ricardo and Riviera. This includes US Highway 77 between mile markers 698 and 708. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
